name: Will XD help me  adapt my design for various screen sizes?
markup: Using a feature called responsive resize, XD helps take the chore out of resizing your design for various sizes. It takes an intelligent guess but you are always in control. If you are enamoured by this feature you can take it to the next level by defining manual contstraints that define how objects should behave during resize.

name: Does XD support creation of micro-interactions and animations?
markup: Using a feature called responsive resize, XD helps take the chore out of resizing your design for various sizes. It takes an intelligent guess but you are always in control. If you are enamoured by this feature you can take it to the next level by defining manual contstraints that define how objects should behave during resize.

name: Can XD help in handing off my design to developers?
markup: Using a feature called design specs, XD helps take the chore out of sharing your design with your development partners. They can extract what they need and its easy to go back and forth.
